content: I was saving up credits to get one of the BP ships (a friend of mine just got the one with a mining laser) So far at 280k tho having difficulty finding some of the resources . Guessing i have to go further than 35k out?
I cant remember the names XD they are all so bloomin weird

I know its supposed to be a time consuming game but some of the asteroids i come across have like... half a stack of a resource in them XD and when i get the auction place its worth like ...400cr haha
XD even if it was zone 2 mats thats alottttaaaa distance to travel with just a starter ship 😛 Im a nub afterall
aye....friend of mine got absolutely wrecked by a faction , he went for a cuppa - got back to 6 ships just bombarding his lil freighter
he forgot to slow down / turn off cruise XD
and had his bloomin beacon thing on - transponder i think its called
Thought i recognised your name too
im playing from time to time but im doin my standard mining schtic
I didnt know they did coding honestly..i thought alot of their stuff was things theyd got from others
